named-query.name: FIND_CHANGE_TRANSACTION
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM ChangeTransactionImpl t WHERE t.transactionId = ?1

named-query.name: GET_MAX_CHANGE_OPERATION_INDEX
named-query.query: SELECT MAX(cso.operationOrder) FROM AbstractChangeOperationImpl cso WHERE cso.changeTransaction.transactionId = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_CHANGE_OPERATIONS_BY_TRANSACTION_ID
named-query.query: SELECT cso FROM ChangeOperationImpl cso WHERE cso.changeTransaction.transactionId = ?1 ORDER BY cso.operationOrder
